name: Jealous Author
description:
I am currently working on a small project, with the project name called "Jealous Author".

Plot: With hot tensions in children literature, a rising author swaying crowds  with his dreamlike stories threatens the position of a  celebrated creator. 

Through misleading loopholes in the law, our crowd favourite, Rex Kamari becomes the victim of blackmail and intellectual attacks.

With his money and possessions stolen from him, Kamari maintains international stardom in the dark plagued with doubt. 

It all ends now though, with back against the wall, Rex seeks to regain what he lost, motivated with his ambition to pave a bright future for his son.

Core Game Mechanics:

Enemy waves gameplay in destroying robots that attempt to harm you or your son and take your writing material.

In between waves, the player will need to write poetry or other literature that is symbolic of the web game "typewriter".

Sell literature under an alias to support yourself and upgrade your tools in order to successfully defend your family.
